name: @obewds/vilt-ds
description: The official repository for the VILT Design System for the Vue.js, Inertia.js, Laravel, and Tailwind CSS web app stack that is turbocharged with Typescript and VueVentus.
author: Matt McT

scripts.tag: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.bump:patch: npm version patch && npm run build
scripts.bump:minor: npm version minor && npm run build
scripts.bump:major: npm version major && npm run build
